org.sadun.util.cache2
Interface CacheExpirationController

All Superinterfaces:
CacheListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
TimeExpirationController
public interface CacheExpirationController
extends CacheListener

Objects implementing this interface control when or not an item in a Cache has expired.

Typically a controller implements some kind of criteria in getExpirationState(Object) to determine wether or not an item is to be considered expired.

Author:
Cristiano Sadun

          Queries whether or not a key has expired.

Method Detail

getExpirationState

public CacheExpirationState getExpirationState(java.lang.Object key)
Queries whether or not a key has expired. If the key does not exists in the cache, returns null.

Parameters:
key -
Returns:
